survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Office Pantry Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the quality, variety, and overall satisfaction with office pantry services to improve offerings and employee experience.

questions.question_text: How often do you use the office pantry services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure frequency. Ensure options cover all possible usage patterns.

script.question_text: How often do you use the office pantry services?

questions.question_text: What types of items would you like to see more of in the office pantry?
questions.client_notes: Use multi-choice to allow selection of multiple preferences. Include an 'Other' option for additional feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice checkboxes with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What types of items would you like to see more of in the office pantry?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of items provided in the office pantry?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of items provided in the office pantry?

questions.question_text: Do you have any dietary restrictions that are not currently accommodated by the office pantry?
questions.client_notes: Use a simple yes/no question to identify unmet dietary needs.

script.question_text: Do you have any dietary restrictions that are not currently accommodated by the office pantry?

questions.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to the previous question, please specify your dietary restrictions.
questions.client_notes: Open-text field to capture specific dietary needs. Ensure the field is optional to avoid forcing responses.

script.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to the previous question, please specify your dietary restrictions.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the office pantry services?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Encourage detailed responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open-text input with a larger text area.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the office pantry services?
